tasks.label: CMake Build Debug
tasks.command: mkdir -p bin && cd bin && cmake ../CMakeLists.txt -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && cmake --build . --parallel 8

tasks.label: CMake Build Release
tasks.command: mkdir -p bin && cd bin && cmake ../CMakeLists.txt -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && cmake --build . --parallel 8
